name: LD31 - The 5th Layer
description:
The Story of a lone Fire Elemental trying to prove his worth... By Destroying all the Snow Golems!


Controls:
WASD - movement
SPACE - shooting
LeftShift - slowing down (this also shows your hitbox!)
ESC - pause/quit

OSX: The OSX version may not run correctly (using lwjgl natives) - Not sure why!
